What is a resurface? I have a feeling my entire friday could be swallowed by testing.. I may not be able to test everything as I will have about 2 hours for this.

Can someone give me detiled instructions how to search the SCE for posts from one week back?

 It seems to want a search term with negates the whole point of my search..

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, Majorjim said:
> 
> 
> How do I search things from the last week?
> 

I just go back until the last post date was last week.

> 
> 
> 45 minutes ago, Majorjim said:
> 
> 
> Can someone give me detiled instructions how to search the SCE for posts from one week back?
> 
> 
> 
> 
>  It seems to want a search term with negates the whole point of my search..
> 

You can use the activity streams. Click on "My Activity Streams" in the Activity drop down then create a new stream. In the settings under Content Type click Topics click the settings button next to Topics and narrow by the Spacecraft Exchange. 

Then under Time Period select Specified Number of Days.

Oh, I mean "resurface" as in "return to the first page because someone posted in it". And yeah, SCF can take a looong time to make. I'll make sure to rep yours for your troubles! At most what I can suggest is to only test the finalists, and if they disappoint, then go for the one whose looks didn't convince you 100%. With such a long time in the forums, I'm pretty confident you can glean a lot of info from a screenshot, to create a temporal "worth a second look" pool that you can look at later in depth.

Rune. The things we do for fun, right? ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")
